title: Using LendingTree Inc. (ticker: TREE) 10-K for FY2024 and FRED data on new originations of large bank consumer mortgages, calculate FY2024 operating income of Home segment. Assume y/y % change of home business revenue from FY2023 to FY2024 equal to y/y growth rate of new originations of large bank consumer mortgages (annual, in US$) and home segment operating profit margin equal to conslolidated operating profit margin. Provide the answer in $M, rounded to 1 decimal.
description:
1. Extract FY2023 Home segment revenue from LendingTree’s FY2024 10-K (the value can be found in NOTE 3—REVENUE to consolidated FS): $143.753M
 
 2. Calculate annual values of “Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations: New Originations (RCMFLOORIG)” sourced from FRED as required in the promt by summing quarterly values:
 2023 = 46.51 + 61.10 + 59.28 + 45.50 = 212.39 
 2024 = 43.33 + 59.64 + 62.57 + 67.98 = 233.52
 
 3. Calculate the y/y growth rate of large bank consumer mortgage originations by dividing 2024 value by 2023 value:
 y/y growth = (233.52/212.39) − 1 = 9.9487%.
 
 4. Calculate FY2024 Home segment revenue using the above growth rate assumption as required in the promt: 
 FY2024 Home segment revenue = $143.753M × 1.099487 = $158.0545M.
 
 4. Calculate consolidated FY2024 operating margin from the FY2024 10-K (values can be found in income statement): Operating income = $44.627M; Total revenue = $900.219M; Operating margin = $44.627M / $900.219M = 4.9573%. 
 
 5. Calculate FY2024 Home segment operating income by applying consolidated margin to the projected Home revenue: $158.0545M × 4.9573% = $7.8353M = $7.8M

rubric.criteria: FY2023 Home segment revenue (located in Note 3 to FS) = $143.753M
2023 Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations (quarterly sum) (from FRED data as specified in the question)= 46.51 + 61.10 + 59.28 + 45.50 = 212.39
2024 Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations (quarterly sum) (from FRED data as specified in the question) = 43.33 + 59.64 + 62.57 + 67.98 = 233.52
Year‑over‑year growth of large bank consumer mortgage originations = 2024 originations / 2023 originations -1 = 9.9487%
Projected FY2024 Home segment revenue = FY23 Revenue * assumed growth rate (calculated at previous step) $143.753M × 1.099487 = $158.0545M
Consolidated operating margin for FY24 =operating profit / Revenue = 4.9573%
Final FY2024 Home segment operating income (rounded to 1 decimal) = $7.8M
